text.headline:
Eloi Sans Gispert
26/03/1993
text.text:
Graduated in Mathematics from the University of Barcelona, I have extensive work experience in both the academic and business worlds. I have tutored related work in ML and Quantic computing. In the business world I have developed APPS with the main Python frameworks: Flask, FastAPI, Dash... Nowadays I'm investigating on AI at the Universitat de les Illes Balears
